A new book will also be released reflecting on how these diaries change what we knew about Michael Collins  We now see Michael Collins from more angles than before, posing new questions.  These diaries were kindly loaned to the State by the Collins family  https://t.co/aDborV6AAp

To mark the centenary of the death of Michael Collins, @NARIreland has completed conservation & digitisation on all five of his diaries 1918 - 1922  They begin with Collins as a revolutionary in 1918 and end with him in 1922 as one of the most significant figures in Ireland. https://t.co/WNGiBQ11gc

Russian disinformation is designed to obscure their responsibility for the illegal invasion of Ukraine, and to deny crimes for which they are responsible.  A strong, independent media is crucial to combatting disinformation.

.@DeptCulturelRL & @Dept_ECC are working together to ensure sanctions related to Russian state-sponsored media service providers are implemented  Penalties for breaching sanctions are set out in Irish law

Today I spoke with @otkachenkoua, Ukraine's Minister of Culture & Information Policy  I reaffirmed Ireland's full support for Ukrainian people and our support for current and any new EU sanctions on Russian state-sponsored media services https://t.co/PGISJ1XJHS

My team will continue to liaise with Go Ahead Ireland on the full restoration of all services on this route.

This route is not on the timetable but will be reflected on the Real Time Passenger Information at stops.  Public transport must be a reliable option for people, particularly people planning daily commutes.

Today I've received confirmation from @GoAheadIreland that they're working on a plan to reinstate the route for the afternoon and I'm pleased to confirm they are running a 75A 5:55pm departure from Dun Laoghaire, Mon - Fri.

Commuters going through #Sandyford,  I was disappointed to learn of the reduction of @GoAheadIreland's 75/75a route & had written to the organisation to ask for its restoration. https://t.co/Zx17Ks22mf https://t.co/UA6f6QSGtw
